subject: Basketball

Free Agents (Sports)
Wages and Salaries
lead_paragraph: This weekend, 16 teams will begin their march toward the N.B.A. finals — and, perhaps, will provide some clues about the wild free-agent summer to come.
snippet: This weekend, 16 teams will begin their march toward the N.B.A. finals — and, perhaps, will provide some clues about the wild free-agent summer to come.
